Title: Explained: Why some coronavirus patients show signs of brain ailments - The Indian Express
Description: Coronavirus symptoms: The patients who come in with encephalopathy are confused and lethargic and may appear dazed, exhibiting strange behavior or staring off into space.

Title: Lockdown may help flatten COVID-19 curve in India, says study - Deccan Herald
Description: The current 21-day lockdown may help reduce the projected number of symptomatic novel coronavirus cases in India by nearly 83 per cent till day 20 from the beginning of the intervention, thereby flattening the COVID-19 curve, scientists say. The modelling stuâ€¦

Title: COVID-19 tracker in India: Some reliable coronavirus trackers you can check out - The Indian Express
Description: Coronavirus (COVID-19) India Cases Live Tracker Map: Currently, there are several coronavirus trackers available online but which are the reliable ones? Here are some of them.

Title: Explained: Are children less vulnerable to novel coronavirus? - The Indian Express
Description: In research about the novel coronavirus so far, the evidence has been that the elderly and those with underlying conditions are more vulnerable. Does that mean children are immune?

Title: U.S. FDA says malaria drugs in shortage as coronavirus drives up demand - Reuters India
Description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said malaria drugs hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine are in shortage due to a surge in demand because of the coronavirus pandemic.

Title: Israel tests coronavirus vaccine prototype on rodents at defence lab - India Today
Description: A source familiar with IIBR activities told Reuters that trials were already under way on rodents. The source declined to identify the kind of rodent.
